metadata.title: CVE-2023-6348 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Type Confusion in Spellcheck in Google Chrome prior to 119.0.6045.199allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
